account.descriptionLink:
18 years of executive management and operations experience in tech, specializing in marketing and business strategy. Web3 advisor to Agora Gaming, Solrise Games, Eyeball Games (ex-Miniclip), and Rivat Labs. Raised $5.5M from Animoca, Spartan, Jump, Crypto.com.

Deliverables: Strategy and Growth advisor, BD, stewardship, fundraising, network access and events representation.

Compensation: Up to 1% $FIRST, vesting.

Term: Until January 01, 2027, or as per agreement.

account.descriptionLink:
